mapper.select: SELECT o.id, o.consignee, o.consignee_tel, o.total_amount, o.order_status, o.user_id , payment_way, o.delivery_address, o.order_comment, o.out_trade_no, o.create_time , o.expire_time , o.process_status, o.tracking_no, o.parent_order_id, od.order_id, od.order_price, od.sku_num, od.id order_detail_id, od.img_url, od.sku_id, od.sku_name FROM order_info o INNER JOIN order_detail od ON o.id=od.order_id WHERE user_id=#{userId} order by create_time desc
